title: Ayurvedic Herbal Oils
description: BUY 100% PURE, NATURAL & ORGANIC AYURVEDIC HERBAL OILS AT WHOLESALE BULK PRICES. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING. GUARANTEED LOWEST PRICES.
cleaned_text: line of pure, organic Ayurvedic Herbal Oils, traditionally crafted using the age-old original recipes, have been relied upon for thousands of years as a fundamental part of Ayurveda. In the ayurvedic tradition, therapeutic oil massage or 'Abhyanga' with Ayurvedic oils is said to balance the three bodily humors, or doshas - vata, pitta, and kapha, helping in rejuvenating the mind and healing the body.
